qas.question: In what month each year is the Southampton Boat Show held?
What waterfront park hosts the Boat Show?
When was the Boat Show first held in Mayflower Park?
What Southampton festival culminates in the Boat Show?
Attendees of the Boat Show can expect to see at least how many exhibitors?

context: The annual Southampton Boat Show is held in <a0_0>September<a0_0/> each year, with over <a4_0>600<a4_0/> exhibitors present. It runs for just over a week at <a1_0>Mayflower Park<a1_0/> on the city's waterfront, where it has been held since <a2_0>1968<a2_0/>. The Boat Show itself is the climax of <a3_0>Sea City<a3_0/>, which runs from April to September each year to celebrate Southampton's links with the sea.
